author: pharaohh
msg: added hsqldb jar file (removed hypersonic dir - that is hsqldb's old name)

author: pharaohh
msg: updated ehcache.xml to include a jsecurity session cache (default production-quality session cache is not enabled when an explicit ehcache.xml is in the classpath).

author: pharaohh
msg: enabled Sessions by default to eliminate exceptions in case SecurityContext.getSession() is ever used.

author: mentiro
msg: Modified filter to support DI.  Modified security manager to disable sessions by default.
